mapper.select: SELECT a.authority_id, a.authority, a.`status`, m.*, ua.user_id, ua.expire_time FROM base_authority_user AS ua INNER JOIN base_authority AS a ON ua.authority_id = a.authority_id INNER JOIN base_menu AS m ON a.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ua.user_id = #{userId} AND a.status = 1

SELECT a.authority_id, a.authority, up.expire_time, 'user' AS owner FROM base_authority_user AS up INNER JOIN base_authority AS a ON up.authority_id = a.authority_id WHERE up.user_id = #{userId} AND a.status = 1
